amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-19 to strike Section 8 relating to the collection by the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission of pay information and other employment-related data (including hiring, termination, and promotion data) disaggregated by the sex, race, and national origin of employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx (NC) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Foxx (NC).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx (NC) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
